title: The Fate of Crowns Box
description: Become immersed in a world where danger lurks around every corner, man-eating mercreatures drag ships to the depths, politics can turn deadly, and betrayal lies in love and friendship.Winter Mortis is no stranger to twists of fate. Going from spare to heir of the throne through a tragic battle, Winter must now fight for her crown as threats lie around every corner. The sheltered princess opens her eyes to the world around her as she adventures through the three kingdoms. Forced to face the truth of her family, kingdom, and relationships with those close to her, Winter must decide her own path before it's chosen for her.The Fate of Crowns Series is a fast-paced YA epic fantasy trilogy. This is the completed trilogy set of The Fate of The Fate of Crowns The Princess of Nothing The Court of Secrets."An imaginative, rollercoaster ride that has turned into one of the best young adult novels I've read in a decade. It's magnificent."- USA Today Bestselling Author Apryl Baker"A spellbinding new world filled with diverse magic systems, dangerous adventures, and morally grey characters that will steal your heart."-Adventures in Ink Book Blog"A story with an epic display of strength and courage in an enchanted world with character so bold and fearless you will be left speechless."- Within the Pages Book Blog
author: Rebecca L.  Garcia
